item.title: Hitler
item.description: Vijay Antony is on a spree with his recent films. While his contemporaries rarely churn out a couple of releases each year, the music director-turned-actor starred in four films last year and his latest release Hitler marks his third outing of 2024. But given how almost all of them turned out to be underwhelming, it feels like heâ€™s shooting for quantity over quality, and Hitler, unfortunately, is the latest addition to that list.
